snippet: Assemblages made from medical supplies, water bottles, ribbons of painted paper and ceramics propose the idea of objects as conduits to other worlds.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews exhibit of works by Hayden Dunham and Meriem Bennani at Signal gallery.
lead_paragraph: Assemblages made from medical supplies, water bottles, ribbons of painted paper and ceramics propose the idea of objects as conduits to other worlds.
